languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 Agility and Perception and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the Overseer's attack hits, the cyber-eagle scores a critical hit against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the round. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all temporary wounds and become immobilised for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 Agility and Perception and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the Overseer's attack hits, the cyber-eagle scores a critical hit against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of round. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle becomes {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ascended{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all temporary wounds and become {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}Immobilized{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 400% больше урона.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, киберорел совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} по цели, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, и уменьшает ее Восприятие на {uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Этот штраф не суммируется.
Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках теряют все {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%400 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} saldırısı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir. Düşmanın Algı niteliği {uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} azalır. Etki, {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikmez.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişikteki düşmanlar tüm {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanlarını kaybedip {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olurlar. Bu etki 1 raunt sürer.

Siber kartal, +20 Çeviklik ve Algı niteliği kazanır. +%400 daha fazla hasar verir.
Gözetmen'in saldırısı vurduğunda siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmana kritik vuruş indirir. Düşmanın Algı niteliği {uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} azalır. Etki, raunt sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikmez.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +400 % de daño.
Cada vez que un ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g}, la ciberáguila asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} y reduce su Percepción en −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Esta penalización no es acumulativa.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleve{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes pierden todas las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de Agilidad y Percepción e inflige un +400 % de daño.
Cada vez que un ataque del supervisor impacte, la ciberáguila asesta un impacto crítico al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} y reduce su Percepción en −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} hasta el final del asalto. Esta penalización no es acumulativa.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleve{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes pierden todas las heridas temporales y quedan inmovilizados durante 1 asalto.

La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +400 % de daño.
Cada vez que un ataque del supervisor {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g}, la ciberáguila asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} y reduce su Percepción en −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Esta penalización no es acumulativa.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleve{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes pierden todas las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高400%。
每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，生化猎鹰都会对{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，同时使其感知降低{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}点，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。此效果不可叠加。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人都会失去全部{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，且陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的敏捷、感知提高20点，造成的伤害提高400%。
每当监察官的攻击命中时，生化猎鹰都会对{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人造成暴击，同时使其感知降低{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}点，持续至本轮结束。此效果不可叠加。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人都会失去全部临时生命值，且陷入定身状态，持续一轮。

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高400%。
每当监察官的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，生化猎鹰都会对{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，同时使其感知降低{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}点，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。此效果不可叠加。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人都会失去全部{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，且陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +400 % Schaden.
Wenn der Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, fügt der Cyber-Adler dem {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu und reduziert seine Wahrnehmung bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}. Dieser Abzug ist nicht stapelbar.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, verlieren Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern alle {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} und werden 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 Beweglichkeit und Wahrnehmung und verursacht +400 % Schaden.
Wenn der Angriff des Aufsehers trifft, fügt der Cyber-Adler dem {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner einen kritischen Treffer zu und reduziert seine Wahrnehmung bis zum Ende der Runde um -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}. Dieser Abzug ist nicht stapelbar.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, verlieren Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern alle temporären Wunden und werden 1 Runde lang gelähmt.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +400 % Schaden.
Wenn der Angriff des Aufsehers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, fügt der Cyber-Adler dem {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu und reduziert seine Wahrnehmung bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}. Dieser Abzug ist nicht stapelbar.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, verlieren Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern alle {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} und werden 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +400 % Schaden.
Wenn der Angriff des Aufsehers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, fügt der Cyber-Adler dem {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu und reduziert seine Wahrnehmung bis zum Ende der Runde um -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}. Dieser Abzug ist nicht stapelbar.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, verlieren Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern alle {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} und werden 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +400 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que l'attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible, le cyber-aigle inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} et réduit sa Perception de -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents perdent toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'Agilité et de Perception de +20 et inflige +400 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que l'attaque du surveillant touche la cible, le cyber-aigle inflige un coup critique à l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} et réduit sa Perception de -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} jusqu'à la fin du round. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents perdent toutes leurs blessures temporaires et subissent l'effet Immobilisation pendant 1 round.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +400 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que l'attaque du surveillant {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible, le cyber-aigle inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} et réduit sa Perception de -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents perdent toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +400 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que l'attaque du surveillant {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible, le cyber-aigle inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} et réduit sa Perception de -{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents perdent toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+20され、与えるダメージが+400%上昇する。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与え、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了まで認知力が−{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}低下する。このペナルティはスタックしない。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}をすべて失い、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +400% damage.
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the cyber-eagle scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy and reduces their Perception by −{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの敏捷性と認知力が+20され、与えるダメージが+400%上昇する。
監督者の攻撃が命中すると、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵に対してクリティカルヒットを与え、ラウンド終了まで認知力が−{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}低下する。このペナルティはスタックしない。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は一時的な傷をすべて失い、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。

サイバーイーグルの敏捷性と認知力が+20され、与えるダメージが+400%上昇する。
監督者の攻撃が命中すると、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵に対してクリティカルヒットを与え、ラウンド終了まで認知力が−{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}低下する。このペナルティはスタックしない。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は一時的な傷をすべて失い、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。

サイバーイーグルの敏捷性と認知力が+20され、与えるダメージが+400%上昇する。
監督者の攻撃が命中すると、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵に対してクリティカルヒットを与え、ラウンド終了まで認知力が−{uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692}低下する。このペナルティはスタックしない。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は一時的な傷をすべて失い、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。

languages.text:
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 400% больше урона.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, киберорел совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} по цели, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, и уменьшает ее Восприятие на {uip|Debuff|d1aa3f6ae4a542f693759c53bebd9692} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Этот штраф не суммируется.
Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках теряют все {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} на 1 раунд.

This penalty does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies lose all {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
